remarks.format: ## Remarks 只發生事件時控制項屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很實用，當您想要判斷其值或狀態資料格的錯誤。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 當您處理事件，並指定錯誤文字中處理常式中，錯誤圖像顯示在儲存格中除非屬性設定為`false`或儲存格處於編輯模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 事件也會發生值擷取屬性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用和屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與事件值會覆寫的屬性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格多個資料格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範設定需要它的儲存格的錯誤文字的委派。The following code example
